mapper.select: select userId, userName, userTel, userAddr1, userRank, userAuth from member
mapper.update: update member set userName = #{userName}, userEmail = #{userEmail}, userTel = #{userTel}, userZipcode = #{userZipcode}, userAddr1 = #{userAddr1}, userAddr2 = #{userAddr2}, userRank = #{userRank}, userAuth = #{userAuth} where userId = #{userId}
mapper.select: select m.userId, m.userName, m.userTel, m.userEmail, m.userRank, g.gdsCode, p.status, o.orderDate, o.orderId from member m inner join ordertbl o on m.userId = o.userId inner join orderProcess p on o.orderId = p.orderId inner join orderDetail d on p.orderId = d.orderId inner join goods g on d.gdsCode = g.gdsCode where g.gdsCode = #{gdsCode}
